<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
InvalidSend occurs when there is a channel send to a value that is not a
channel, or is a receive-only channel.

Example:
 func f() {
 	var x = 1
 	x {{raw "<"}}- "hello!"
 }
```
